name: YesterdaySalesfromQuickBookswithvoice
0:
”Alexa open Yesterday Sales”
”Alexa launch Yesterday Sales”
”Alexa load Yesterday Sales”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yesterday sales
des:
Yesterday Sales from QuickBooks with voice is an unofficial skill that gets your QuickBooks metrics. It will help you to know what is the performance of your Business. Currently, the Skill only retrieves your Yesterday Sales revenue. It is the first version and the Skill will be improved over time.


How to use Yesterday Sales from QuickBooks with voice?

First, you need to authorize the Skill using the Alexa App: there is "Link Account" button in the Skill page or there is a Account Linking card sent to your Alexa App after launching Yesterday Sales Skill for the first time.
